# Stop Transparent
<!--
@name: Stop Transparent
@description: 
@tags: 
@categories: 
\-->
<div class="compatibility"><span>Compatibility</span><img src="https://doc.aoz.studio/assets/images/common/compatibility/aoz_logo.png" valign="center" alt="AOZ" title="AOZ" /></div>

Set one colour of the current screen as opaque. Will invoke a complete remapping of the screen that migght take a long time.
## Parameters

- **colors**: A list of indexes of colours in the screen palette eparated by a comma
---
<p align="center"><img valign="middle" width="76px" src="https://doc.aoz.studio/assets/images/en/image001.png" /></p>
